description: Keeping a close eye on all valuable metrics to be a successful SNO

targets.query: SELECT mean("Percent_Free_Space") FROM "win_disk" WHERE "instance" = 'H:' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.description: Downloads from this node - (uploads to client)
panels.title: GET Ratio

panels.description: Downloads to this node (uploads from client)
panels.title: PUT Ratio

targets.query: SELECT mean("Bytes_Received_persec") AS "Bytes Received persec", mean("Bytes_Sent_persec") AS "Bytes Sent persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE  "instance" =~ /$network$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", instance fill(linear)

alert.message: StorJ Node has rebooted more than once in 24 hours!
alert.name: Reboot Alert

alert.message:
StorJ node has critical audit message.  Please verify mount points, fstab, etc.
docker logs storagenode 2>&1 | grep GET_AUDIT | grep failed | grep open
alert.name: Audit Critical alert

alert.message:
InfoDB Critical Warning.  Check InfoDB Health.

docker logs storagenode 2>&1 | grep "disk image is malformed"
https://storjlabs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SCKB/pages/104235043/How+to+fix+a+database+disk+image+is+malformed
alert.name: InfoDB check alert

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "StorJHealth" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: Host
list.name: HOST
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "StorJHealth" WITH KEY = "host"

title: Storj V3 Health
